verses.text: A Song of degrees for Solomon. Except the LORD shall build the house, they labor in vain that build it: except the LORD shall keep the city, the watchman waketh in vain.
It isvain for you to rise early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: forso he giveth his beloved sleep.
Lo, children area heritage of the LORD: andthe fruit of the womb is hisreward.
As arrows arein the hand of a mighty man: so arechildren of the youth.
Happy isthe man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
